TEI.2.document_title: Moses Austin to Peter W. Love, 06-07-1811

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 192

div1.p: Be so good as to send me word by Mr Moses Bates whether the Lead on Mr Wilkenson by Hartshorn and White can be had should a Cart be sent on the morrow As I am truly distress for Lead to make out my Boat load—
Durham Hall Mine A Burton June 7 1811 [Addressed] Mr Peter W Love Mine Shibboleth
